{"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Peter for 2024-09-22 - 2024-10-20", "summary": "Requesting funding for my DevHub contributions in the period 22nd of September to 20th of October 2024. 46 hours in total. Fixed bugs on the devhub portal and the treasury dashboard. Also an extra testing effort on the Treasury dashboard as well as strengthening the automatic Playwright testing framework there.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "Below is a log of the time spent for various tasks. As usual I am asking for the compensation rate of $150 per hour, which I consider the rate for a senior developer/architect in Norway, also then taking into account expenses of self employment.\\\\n\\\\n| Date | Amount | Task | Issue/PR | Description |\\\\n| ---------- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |\\\\n| 2024-09-22 | 0,5 | Seeing other proposal after submit | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/936](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/936) | Register and describe the issue |\\\\n| 2024-09-23 | 1 | Improve proposal viewer | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/929](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/929) | Call with Megha, assisting on rewriting locators for tests after inserting new markdown editor. |\\\\n| 2024-09-23 | 0,5 | Reviews | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/934
](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/934)[https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/931](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/931) | Review PRs about linked RFPs and updating markdown editor ( and adding of new feature with image uploads in the markdown ) |\\\\n| 2024-09-24 | 0,5 | Seeing other proposal after submit | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/942](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/942) | trying to reproduce the scenario by adding check that the submitted proposal has status DRAFT which is failing because of issue After submitting a proposal draft, you see another proposal |\\\\n| 2024-09-25 | 0,5 | Sync | | Weekly sync call |\\\\n| 2024-09-25 | 0,5 | Seeing other proposal after submit | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/942](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/942) | add check that for a proposal with the next id to show up, and that the status is DRAFT. Scenario is still not reproduced |\\\\n| 2024-09-26 | 2 | Seeing other proposal after submit | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/942](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/942) | Still trying to reproduce the scenario, by adding a test for creating a proposal without dont ask again cache values set, which is not the reason why it fails. Finally finding the way to reproduce by caching the value of get_all_proposals_ids in NearSocialVM cache, which is also the case when you have submitted a draft earlier. Also found that it is needed for the view call to respond a bit slow to not override the values from the cache. |\\\\n| 2024-09-27 | 3 | Seeing other proposal after submit | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/942](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/942) | fix issue by checking that the latest proposal title and description matches what was submitted. reduce flakyness in tests by increasing some timeout. remove the test for creating a proposal without dont ask again cache values set, since it is not relevant for the scenario |\\\\n| 2024-09-29 | 1 | infra/events, see the proposal you submit | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/944](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/944) | Fix for events-committee ( applying the same as from devhub ), added mock of is_allowed_to_edit_proposal in devhub test so that it can be used also for events-committee. |\\\\n| 2024-09-29 | 0,5 | Proposal with Linked RFP should not have custom labels | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/946](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/946) | Checked the UI code that has logic for not including labels when there is a linked RFP. Seeing from the transaction that custom labels was included. Registered issue. |\\\\n| 2024-10-01 | 0,5 | infra/events, see the proposal you submit | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/945](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/945) | editing proposal lag test working for events-committee, split out proposal tests that currently only work on devhub |\\\\n| 2024-10-02 | 0,5 | Sync | | Weekly sync call |\\\\n| 2024-10-05 | 3 | Infinex treasury dashboard | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/59](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/59) | add infinex instance to tests, handle difference that infinex does not have linked proposals, adjust web4 landing page to support different instances |\\\\n| 2024-10-06 | 1 | Infinex treasury dashboard | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/59](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/59) | Investigate tests after web4 support for multiple instances. Adjust web4 index.html for connecting to local RPC proxy if running from port 8080 ( since the viewer is now created from JS, and the gateway script is not able to replace the viewer element in the HTML anymore ). |\\\\n| 2024-10-06 | 0,5 | Markdown viewer tests | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/949](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/949) | Call with Megha about markdown viewer tests |\\\\n| 2024-10-06 | 2 | infra/events, see the proposal you submit | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/944](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/944) | adjust create proposal test, and fix bug for infrastructure committee, fix tests for infrastructure-committee: \\\\\\\"edit proposal timeline from review to decision\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"move proposal timeline to decision stage without approving KYC in review stage\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"editing proposal should not be laggy\\\\\\\" |\\\\n| 2024-10-07 | 0,5 | infra/events, see the proposal you submit | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/944](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/944) | adjust events-committee specific proposal test to work with the bugfix ( the mock data must return the same title and description as the submitted proposal ) |\\\\n| 2024-10-07 | 1 | Fix that submitting proposal button does not stop spinning | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/951](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/951) | Based on issue report on infra-committee that when submitting a proposal, the button was spinning forever. Reproduced in Playwright test, and solved by adding retries looking for the latest proposal to available from the contract view methods. |\\\\n| 2024-10-08 | 1 | Clean URLs for RFP | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/152](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/152) | Contract support for clean URLs for RFPs |\\\\n| 2024-10-09 | 1 | Sync | | Weekly sync call, intro to create flow of treasury dashboard |\\\\n| 2024-10-09 | 1 | Treasury dashboard staking delegation | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/60](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/60) | First test for creating stake delegation request |\\\\n| 2024-10-10 | 1 | Treasury dashboard tests / markdown viewer | | Call with Megha about markdown viewer and limitations with multiple newlines, also talked about test cases needed for Treasury dashboard. Need to handle multiple approvers, and also need ot handle different configuration across instances |\\\\n| 2024-10-10 | 2 | Treasury dashboard staking delegation | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/60](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/60) | add \\\\\\\"treasury-testing\\\\\\\" as playwright test project. staking delegation test checking the config is the instance has the staking delegation page |\\\\n| 2024-10-11 | 1 | Treasury dashboard testing | | Added 7 issues to the testing sheet about payment requests and dashboard. Tested payment requests, approving and rejecting, transferred tokens into the the DAO ( requested them back again ). Also testing adding members. |\\\\n| 2024-10-12 | 3 | Share proposal comment links | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-portal/issues/956](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-portal/issues/956) | Registered issue and created reproduction in playwright test. Fix copy url by switching to devhub commentsandlogs and also checking which instance account that is currently active. Fixed for infrastructure and events committee. Fix so that copy url for proposal goes to web4 page. Handle in test that comments on RFPs are not in iframe anymore
Found that repository name changed and broke the github addon test. Repository name changed back. Add test for clicking like on a proposal comment |\\\\n| 2024-10-12 | 0,5 | Treasury dashboard staking delegation | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/60](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/60) | Video of staking delegation test, and a note about contributing with tests |\\\\n| 2024-10-13 | 0,5 | Shared types | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/154](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/154) | Review, requesting more coverage for the migration tests |\\\\n| 2024-10-13 | 3 | treasury infinex testing instance | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/64](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/64) | Payment request tests:
run payment request tests on both devdao and infinex instances
mock inventory, including NEAR inventory ( if the response from [https://api3.nearblocks.io/v1/account/treasury-devdao.sputnik-dao.near](https://api3.nearblocks.io/v1/account/treasury-devdao.sputnik-dao.near) is {\\\\\\\"account\\\\\\\":[{}]}, then the token select dropdown disappear ( need to investigate in a separate test )
Also increase mocked inventory amounts to avoid the \\\\\\\"insufficient funds\\\\\\\" warning message to appear
check if proposal selection is enabled for the instance in the config
press sequentially in total amount field to reduce flakyness |\\\\n| 2024-10-15 | 1 | Treasury dashboard testing | | Call with Megha and Thomas going through the Treasury Dashboard QA findings |\\\\n| 2024-10-15 | 0,5 | Treasury dashboard | | Review of fix PRs, checking SputnikDAO contract sources regarding setting quorum, num and denum to zero in order to only require one vote |\\\\n| 2024-10-16 | 1,5 | Sync | | Weekly sync call, discussing new github boards, and limitations of BOS and alternatives. Priorities: Treasury dashboard issues, Indexer replacement |\\\\n| 2024-10-17 | 1 | Treasury dashboard | | Call with Megha about mocking pikespeak responses ( also failures ), quorum / threshold setting in SputnikDAO, mocking policy in tests (for handling the instances that does not have the same admin users). |\\\\n| 2024-10-17 | 2 | Treasury dashboard payment requests | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77) | extend create payment request test to check that payment requests appear in pending requests after submission. |\\\\n| 2024-10-17 | 1 | Treasury dashboard web4 | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77) | Investigation of Treasury dashboard web4 failing in near-workspaces-rs with \\\\\\\"{ vm_error: \\\\\\\"wasm execution failed with error: CompilationError(PrepareError(Deserialization))\\\\\\\", trying updating near-sdk, workspaces, looking into the serialization directives on the contract.
Improve codespace setup to use feature-packs instead of installing in post-create script. |\\\\n| 2024-10-18 | 1 | Treasury dashboard web4 failing | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/81](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/81) | Still investigate Treasury dashboard web4 failing in near-workspaces-rs. Testing manual deployment and seeing the same issue on testnet.

Verifying that there are no changes on our side, and coming to the conclusion that it has to be in dependencies or in the network network, since it fails with the same error message on both in the near-workspaces-rs and on testnet. Also seeing that existing web4 contracts are running fine, but when deploying a new build now then it fails. It all worked until yesterday. Tough to investigate, so reaching out if anyone know of any breaking changes elsewhere, which would be useful info.
|\\\\n| 2024-10-18 | 0,5 | Treasury dashboard payment requests | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77) | Update with latest changes and verify with all instances. Test videos. |\\\\n| 2024-10-18 | 0,5 | Treasury dashboard web4 failing | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/81](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/81) | After feedback that the reason is support for new Wasm features in Rust, and that cargo-near-build has a fix ( utilizing wasm-opt ), I noticed that near-workspaces-rs does still not have a new release using the latest cargo-near-build. Will wait for a new release of near-workspaces-rs |\\\\n| 2024-10-19 | 1 | Fix web4 contract after rust upgrade | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/82](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/82) | Upgrade near-workspaces-rs to the newly released version that has the fix. Fix compiler warnings about unused variables. Verify the codespace setup and the upgrade of near-sdk-rs as well. |\\\\n| 2024-10-20 | 3 | Treasury dashboard - tests | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/83](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/83) | Fix failing tests, and configure github action to stop on failure. Handle \\\\\\\"test ended\\\\\\\" errors in routes with \\\\\\\"unroute all\\\\\\\" after each test. Fix compilation errors. Reduce flakyness with more specific locators, and a bit more ( see PR link ) |\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 46\\\\nHourly rate (USD): $150\\\\nTotal requested amount (USD): 6900", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "petersalomonsen.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "6900", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 130813089}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *DevDAO Platform* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @petersalomonsen.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}DevHub Developer Contributor report by Peter for 2024-09-22 - 2024-10-20\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRequesting funding for my DevHub contributions in the period 22nd of September to 20th of October 2024. 46 hours in total. Fixed bugs on the devhub portal and the treasury dashboard. Also an extra testing effort on the Treasury dashboard as well as strengthening the automatic Playwright testing framework there.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=229)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

Priorities: Treasury dashboard issues, Indexer replacement |\\\\n| 2024-10-17 | 1 | Treasury dashboard | | Call with Megha about mocking pikespeak responses ( also failures ), quorum / threshold setting in SputnikDAO, mocking policy in tests (for handling the instances that does not have the same admin users). |\\\\n| 2024-10-17 | 2 | Treasury dashboard payment requests | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77) | extend create payment request test to check that payment requests appear in pending requests after submission. |\\\\n| 2024-10-17 | 1 | Treasury dashboard web4 | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77) | Investigation of Treasury dashboard web4 failing in near-workspaces-rs with \\\\\\\"{ vm_error: \\\\\\\"wasm execution failed with error: CompilationError(PrepareError(Deserialization))\\\\\\\", trying updating near-sdk, workspaces, looking into the serialization directives on the contract.
Improve codespace setup to use feature-packs instead of installing in post-create script. |\\\\n| 2024-10-18 | 1 | Treasury dashboard web4 failing | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/81](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/81) | Still investigate Treasury dashboard web4 failing in near-workspaces-rs. Testing manual deployment and seeing the same issue on testnet.

Verifying that there are no changes on our side, and coming to the conclusion that it has to be in dependencies or in the network network, since it fails with the same error message on both in the near-workspaces-rs and on testnet. Also seeing that existing web4 contracts are running fine, but when deploying a new build now then it fails. It all worked until yesterday. Tough to investigate, so reaching out if anyone know of any breaking changes elsewhere, which would be useful info.
|\\\\n| 2024-10-18 | 0,5 | Treasury dashboard payment requests | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/77) | Update with latest changes and verify with all instances. Test videos. |\\\\n| 2024-10-18 | 0,5 | Treasury dashboard web4 failing | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/81](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/81) | After feedback that the reason is support for new Wasm features in Rust, and that cargo-near-build has a fix ( utilizing wasm-opt ), I noticed that near-workspaces-rs does still not have a new release using the latest cargo-near-build. Will wait for a new release of near-workspaces-rs |\\\\n| 2024-10-19 | 1 | Fix web4 contract after rust upgrade | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/82](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/82) | Upgrade near-workspaces-rs to the newly released version that has the fix. Fix compiler warnings about unused variables. Verify the codespace setup and the upgrade of near-sdk-rs as well. |\\\\n| 2024-10-20 | 3 | Treasury dashboard - tests | [https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/83](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/83) | Fix failing tests, and configure github action to stop on failure. Handle \\\\\\\"test ended\\\\\\\" errors in routes with \\\\\\\"unroute all\\\\\\\" after each test. Fix compilation errors. Reduce flakyness with more specific locators, and a bit more ( see PR link ) |\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 46\\\\nHourly rate (USD): $150\\\\nTotal requested amount (USD): 6900", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "petersalomonsen.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "6900", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "petersalomonsen.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}
